text: "My Turn" is a song performed by Swedish singer John Lundvik. The song made it to the final of Melodifestivalen 2018 from the first semi-final.John Lundviks tårkaos efter segern Aftonbladet Retrieved 7 March 2018 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2018) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 10 |} ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:English-language Swedish songs Category:Melodifestivalen songs of 2018 Category:Swedish pop songs Category:Songs written by John Lundvik
title: My Turn (John Lundvik song)
